Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Logan Square.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service. Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/Armitage
ShortDescription: SB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Armitage, Grand, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Armitage, Grand, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Armitage.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
